name: In re Nomination Papers of Gerald R. CARLSON as the Candidate of a Political Body for the Office of Representative in the United States House of Representatives
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Papers of Carlson

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Papers of Gerald R. CARLSON as the Candidate of a Political Body for the Office of Representative in the United States House of Representatives.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.

attorneys: Joseph H. Huston, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1155
In re Nomination Papers of Gerald R. CARLSON as the Candidate of a Political Body for the Office of Representative in the United States House of Representatives.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued June 19, 1981.
Decided June 25, 1981.
Gerald R. Carlson, pro se.
Joseph H. Huston, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
